meanings.definition: The position or role of an ambassador.
meanings.sent1: Her ambassadorship allowed her to represent her country abroad.
meanings.sent2: He was honored with the ambassadorship to France.
meanings.sent3: The ambassadorship came with a fancy title and a lot of responsibility.
meanings.sent4: In the world of diplomacy, securing an ambassadorship is a great achievement.
meanings.sent5: The ambassadorship was a prestigious role that required tact and diplomacy.

meanings.definition: The act of serving as an ambassador.
meanings.sent1: During her ambassadorship, she worked to strengthen international relations.
meanings.sent2: His successful ambassadorship led to improved trade agreements.
meanings.sent3: The ambassadorship involved attending many formal events and meetings.
meanings.sent4: She handled the challenges of her ambassadorship with grace and skill.
meanings.sent5: The ambassadorship required him to navigate complex political landscapes.
